entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 2:50 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -19.9°C
Wind: NW 30 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
